story.text: [[Podcast ]] are distributed using RSS. To listen to a podcast, a user adds the RSS feed to their podcast client, and the client can then list available episodes and download or stream them for listening or viewing. To be included in a podcast directory the feed must for each episode provide a title, description, artwork, category, language, and explicit rating - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RSS#Podcasting_and_RSS wikipedia]
